column3: str

Lisette de Valentione's gaze is as sultry as rumor holds─and yet her eyes are wandering distractedly. 
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Lisette de Valentione, vaunted emissary of love and ardor, is having sister trouble─to wit, said sister is being uncharacteristically insistent that she relieve Lisette of her duties during this year's Valentione's Day celebrations. Upon personally questioning sister Astrid, you discover that her demand stems from a desire to allow Lisette time with her betrothed during this season of romance. After pledging your own support in the matter, Lisette finally consents to her younger sister's wishes, counciling her to stay true to her heart as she fulfills her duty as an emissary of affection.

The first thing Astrid asks of you is to accompany her colleague, an emissary-in-training named Emilie, on a promotional tour around Gridania. You speak to Emilie to get started, but not before you take note of the intense look of determination on Astrid's face─and her unusually frilly outfit. 

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

You and Emilie set off towards the Leatherworkers' Guild to begin your advertising campaign. Behind you the lilt of a haltingly improvised love poem tells you Astrid is also hard at work.

※You must be accompanied by Emilie to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.
You managed to snag the interest of a Gridanian resident with your enthusiastic pitch. Next, Emilie suggests you head towards the Shaded Bower.
You secure another participant for the festivities, but Emilie seems somewhat thrown by his offhand compliment. Shaking off her reaction, Emilie sets her sights on the Centaur's Eye.

Another (rather fanciful) participant hurries off towards the heart of seasonal merrymaking, but Emilie confesses her uneasiness towards her own state of dress. In truth, she admits, she would rather wear something “adorable” rather than “handsome,” but felt it her supporting duty to contrast Lady Astrid's attire. After encouraging her to share her true feelings with Astrid, you part ways for a time to let Emilie gather her thoughts.

You meet Emilie back at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre only to find Astrid looking rather bedraggled. According to Astrid, receiving the attentions borne of her “darling” outfit has been exhausting and oddly disheartening, and yet she feels it is her duty as Lady Lisette's successor to weather it nonetheless. Emilie takes this chance to admit her similar feelings, and you both urge Astrid to consider that love of one's natural inclinations is as worthy a love as any other. Astrid is bosltered by your encouragement and vows to consider the kind of emissary she is best suited to become─after changing into a suit herself, that is. Exchanging outfits, Astrid and Emilie set off to continue the Valentione's Day celebrations, both brimming with confidence in body, mind, and dress.
Speak with Emilie and have her accompany you.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie again.
Speak with Gridanian residents while accompanied by Emilie yet again.
Speak with Emilie.
As dawnlight strikes heavens above, so too eternal beams my love.Though dusk may come to swallow sky, the night shall taste of─why, hello there!
My hero of zeal, my champion of cherishers! 'Tis ever a pleasure to meet you in so roseate a season.
You, my dear, have the unmistakable and otherworldly gleam of a <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> seeking to champion the cause of love!
If you have a moment, I should be much obliged to hear your thoughts upon a certain matter of the heart. Rather, a matter of <Emphasis>my</Emphasis> heart...

It regards my sister, you see─darling Astrid has been demanding I entrust her with the Valentione's Day celebrations this year, and while her enthusiasm does her credit, I simply cannot shirk my responsibilities as premier emissary of ardor!
No matter what I say, she will not budge on the matter. But perhaps if she heard it from the luscious lips of an eminent adventurer such as yourself...?
No! Pout your lips at me all you like─I simply <Emphasis>must</Emphasis> be allowed to manage the festivities this year! I assure you, my reasons are far from peevish!
You see, Lady Lisette is betrothed─and most deeply in love! Yet, during the very season she should be celebrating those affections, she devotes all her time and energy to others'!
I admit, at first I did not approve of her choice in partner. Hortefense's upbringing is so decidedly different from my sister's...
...But through my work as an emissary, I have come to realize that matters such as status are but trifling affairs in the face of true love.
Which is why I wish my sister would practice with her own heart the very same care she preaches!

L-Look here, my child─while you seem to have blossomed into an emissary more effective than even <Emphasis>I</Emphasis> could have anticipated, the reputation and prestige of House Valentione rests upon <Emphasis>my</Emphasis> seasoned-yet-maidenly shoulders.
Failure and mishaps do not become a family such as ours. You understand all that is at stake, yes?
Of course! I do not take this duty lightly─I have even secured the cooperation of our new emissary-in-training to help me facilitate this year's events!
...What think you, adventurer?
What will you say?
Astrid seems capable enough. And I should be honored to assist her.
The “in-training” part gives me pause...
Well... It would be terribly incharitable of me to refuse such a generous offer...
W-Well, I suppose this would be a new endeavor for the both of us...
...But if <Emphasis>you</Emphasis> were to help us, I'm certain all would work out swimmingly!
That settles it! With such a competant─and dare I say alluring─adventurer at your side, I have little doubt that this year's Valentione's Day will be remembered as a resounding success.
I hereby leave our legacy in your capable hands, Astrid. Remember to stay true to yourself, and you shan't be steered ill.
...But even if aught should run awry, fret not─there is little Lady Lisette cannot right with her indubitable charms.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I've some important matters to attend.
...Namely of the tall and handsome variety. Mmm...
We've done it! Thank you for your assistance, dear adventurer─now I'm afraid I must impose upon you further.
Originally, I had planned to make the rounds with Emilie, our new recruit, to advertise the ceremony we shall be hosting later on.
However, now that I have officially assumed Lady Lisette's responsibilities, I am obliged to remain here, at her post. Might you accompany Emilie in my stead to publicize our event?
Thank you! Wait here─I shall go fetch Emilie!
Ahem! In love's fine season, our task is one─to spread gay tidings to all and...one? Erm, allow me to present our new apprentice of adulation!
O-Oh, the dress? Yes, well, it is quite the departure from what I normally wear... But Lady Lisette's successor must not put her to shame!
It is a pleasure to meet you, kind adventurer! I am Emilie, a humble student and admirer of the Valentione emissaries.
Let Emilie know when you are ready to, er, fly forth upon messangers' wings and spread news of our congregation!
Go forth, my sweet cherubs! Deliver thine message of love and...return once you're done, I suppose.
Shall we be off, then?
I must admit, initiating conversation with strangers feels rather daunting... Would it be alright if I left that to you?
Thank you! I feel more confident already. Let us begin our campaign by the Leatherworkers' Guild. Perhaps some artisans may be interested in our event.
What to do with all this free time...?
What to do with all this free time...?
What will you say?
Come celebrate Valentione's Day with us!
Will you not grace us with your presence at today's event, my dear?
Lali-ho!
Bright, enthusiastic, and straight to the point─an ideal invitation!
Dare I say that Lady Lisette herself could not have asked it better!
Lali...ho? I-I am not familiar with its meaning, but what a unique collection of sounds!

Erm...w-we are hosting Valentione's Day celebrations at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre! There will be costumes and merrymaking and a special congregation wherein participants profess their love! Please join us if you have the time.
What a lot of fun that sounds! Thank you for the invitation─I'll head over straightaway.
A success! How heartening indeed.
Let us head towards the markets and see if any in the Shaded Bower might be similarly persuaded. Oh, and I shall try offering the first word this time─your example just now was most informative!
Little rewards a hard day's work like convivial recreation!
Little rewards a hard day's work like convivial recreation!
Come celebrate Valentione's Day with us!
Will you not grace us with your presence at today's event, my dear?
La...Lali-ho?
We are hosting Valentione's Day celebrations at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre! Come join us for refreshments, costumes, and a special ceremony wherein participants proclaim their affections!
A handsome invitation from a handsome lass! How could I refuse? I'll be there with my wife─oh how she loves that sort of thing!
A-Ah, delightful! My regards to your wife...
"Handsome,“ am I...?
Not...quite what I expected...
A-Anyway, let us be along─through the Ebony Stalls and to the Centaur's Eye!
When they say “the quickest way to the heart is through the stomach” do they mean with chocolates, or...?
Good <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>evening<Else/>morning</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>day<Else/>evening</If></If>, my fellow maiden!
Oh! H-Hello.

Have you heard about the Valentione's Day celebrations happening at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre? There will be <Emphasis>adorable</Emphasis> costumes to try on and an opportunity to speak of love to your heart's content!
It's finally happened... A dashingly handsome herald has come bearing a summons to a romantic rendezvous... Of course I'll go... I'll go posthaste...!
...<Emphasis>Dashingly</Emphasis> handsome!? <sigh>
I am sure there is no ill will in it, but I...well, do you remember the dress Lady Astrid was wearing?
The frills and lace...the darling little buttons! I know Lady Astrid expressed her uncertainties at first, but it suits her ever so well, do you not agree?
Lady Lisette could not ask for a kinder nor more determined successor, and I only hope to lend whatever small power I have to amplifying Lady Astrid's natural brilliance.
I thought that by donning this suit I could provide suitable contrast to her cute countenance. Only...

...Oh, I just don't feel <Emphasis>comfortable</Emphasis> like this! I have always adored looking adorable─and being called “handsome” makes me realize how far from myself I feel right now... But it is such a petty, selfish thing to lament...
What will you say?
I wouldn't say that.
I'm sure Astrid wouldn't think so.
Truly? Perhaps...I will try speaking with Astrid about it after all.
I-I shall need a moment to gather my thoughts. Let us meet at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre anon!
H-How generous you are, kind person, to speak so flatteringly of my, er, corporeal form! Please enjoy the festivities!
Oh, you have returned as well...
Despite taking the most scenic of scenic routes, I seem to have arrived with little clarity as to how I might broach the subject...
...But I have resolved to speak with her, so I hope you shall stand by me as I do!
W-Welcome back, my messengers of...messages. How fared your efforts?
Splendidly! We met many hearts eager to celebrate this season of love, and I...well, I should like to discuss something with you...
...At a later time. Lady Astrid, are you quite well? Your face seems rather pale...
Oh, er─fret not, Emilie! I am simply blanched with anticipation for today's most happy events! Peaked with passion, as it were! Vigorous with, er...oh, sod it. <sigh>
What I mean to say is while I'm sure everyone means well by it, having strangers bombard you with blandishments like “adorable” and “darling” all day is deceptively exhausting.
I know I ought to desire such flattery─as a daughter of nobility, my role was to excel in the sort of social niceties expected of beautiful and ladylike aristocrats.
...But I soon came to realize that my heart resonates more naturally with the handsome and gallant. Like the lady knights of Ishgard's High Houses...
Would that I had the talent and stamina required of such a calling. It is said that our ancestor Countess Arabelle was highly proficient in combat herself, you know...

Still, adopting chivalry into my daily guise and manner has always given me great comfort. But if I am to become a Valentione emissary worthy of succeeding Lady Lisette, somehow I must acclimate to these...ruffles.
What will you say?
Emilie would be happy to trade outfits with you!
But isn't personal preference a type of love worthy of attention?
Wh-Wh-What are you doing!? I haven't─my thoughts! I must gather my thoughts!
Perhaps. But the duty of an emissary is to guide the hearts of the needy─I mustn't let my own affairs interfere.
...Lady Astrid. I believe you have described an exhaustion I feel particularly sympathetic to, as I have just experienced it myself─if in the reverse.
For you see, nothing gives me greater pleasure than to be called “adorable” or “darling”! However, in this “handsome” suit I feel anything but...
Should not true emissaries of love cherish themselves, in both character and preference alike? Would not leading by example inspire courage in those seeking to embrace their own hearts?
W-Well...when you put it that way...
...It sounds remarkably similar to what I was trying to convince Lisette of in the first place. Oh dear...
I always assumed that to succeed a legacy, one must embody it entirely and without question. But thinking on it now...
No, if I am to stay true to myself as my sister advised, I shall need trousers and a pocket square with all due haste!
Lady Lisette will always be an inspiration to me, but I will never amount to half her legacy without giving serious thought to what sort of emissary I, and I alone, may best become.
What could be better than celebrating Valentione's Day in an outfit you love? Oh, I cannot wait to look pretty again!
Come, Emilie! Help me take off this dress!
If only you knew the inspiration you are to <Emphasis>me</Emphasis>, my dear Astrid. I have left the Valentione legacy in very capable hands, indeed.
I could not agree more, nor could I be more grateful. After all, this gives us more time to consider our <Emphasis>own</Emphasis> legacy...
...W-We'll get around to it. The Holy See wasn't built in a day, you know...
You now have access to the Valentione's Ceremony seasonal instance! To enter the venue, speak with the House Valentione servant at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
The Valentione's Ceremony is an instance designed for a party of two. There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.
In the event that you register for the ceremony alone, your partner will be found via the matching system.
Emilie is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
You can leave Emilie behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
If you wish to have Emilie accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
While you are accompanied, you may encounter “conversation points” along the way which offer additional topics of discussion.
Enter the glowing area and speak with your quest companions to initiate these bonus conversations. Enjoy exploring your surroundings together!
What will you do?
<UIForeground>F20224</UIForeground>Discuss Valentione's Day.<UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
<UIForeground>F20224</UIForeground>Discuss gifts.<UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
<UIForeground>F20224</UIForeground>Discuss the Centaur's Eye.<UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Speak with Emilie.
Part ways with Emilie.
Nothing.
Look, you can see Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre from here! Is it not a vision? I simply love Valentione's Day─the soft colors, the hearts, the adorable costumes...
I am so glad I found the courage to ask Lady Lisette if I could become an emissary! It still feels like a dream come true.
This time of year, the markets are plentifully stocked with Valentione's gifts. They say chocolate from the Bismarck is particularly exquisite.
Wait─is this a personal query? Are you planning to send a gift to someone!? Well, this is just my advice, but chocolates and a red Azeyma rose are sure to make you the coeurl's meow!
This is my brother-in-law's shop. He proposed to my sister on Valentione's Day, you know...and I have never known a happier couple!
Let us offer our best efforts to Lady Astrid! Shall we be along?
Are you sure you wish to part ways with Emilie?
You have a pressing matter to attend? Very well! Come find me at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre once you are finished.
Welcome back! Let us be off again.
You must be accompanied by Emilie and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
Emilie has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
